why-ytchap: When you give captions in more than one language, you let a lot more people watch your content. Imagine making a travel vlog that people in Italy could understand and use to plan their dream holiday, or a cooking tutorial that people in Spain could use to improve their cooking skills. TubeChapters lets you meet with more people and grow your channel around the world, even if they don't speak the same language.
